verses.verse: Therefore<WG3767> being justified<WG1344> by faith,<WG4102> we have<WG2192> peace<WG1515> with God<WG2316> through<WG1223> our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ:<WG5547>

By whom<WG3739> also<WG2532> we have<WG2192> access<WG4318> by faith<WG4102> into<WG1519> this<WG5026> grace<WG5485> wherein<WG1722> <WG3757> we stand,<WG2476> and rejoice<WG2744> in hope<WG1680> of the glory<WG1391> of God.<WG2316>
And not only<WG3440> so, but we glory<WG2744> in tribulations<WG2347> also:<WG2532> knowing<WG1492> that tribulation<WG2347> works<WG2716> patience;<WG5281>
And patience,<WG5281> experience;<WG1382> and experience,<WG1382> hope:<WG1680>

And hope<WG1680> makes<WG2617> not ashamed;<WG2617> because<WG3754> the love<WG26> of God<WG2316> is shed<WG1632> abroad<WG1632> in our hearts<WG2588> by the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> which<WG3588> is given<WG1325> to us.
For when we were yet<WG2089> without<WG772> strength,<WG772> in due<WG514> time<WG2540> Christ<WG5547> died<WG599> for the ungodly.<WG765>
For scarcely<WG3433> for a righteous<WG1342> man will one<WG5100> die:<WG599> yet<WG1063> peradventure<WG5029> for a good<WG18> man some<WG5100> would even dare<WG5111> to die.<WG599>
But God<WG2316> commends<WG4921> his love<WG26> toward<WG1519> us, in that, while we were yet<WG2089> sinners,<WG268> Christ<WG5547> died<WG599> for us.
Much<WG4183> more<WG3123> then,<WG3767> being now<WG3568> justified<WG1344> by his blood,<WG129> we shall be saved<WG4982> from wrath<WG3709> through<WG1223> him.

For if,<WG1487> when we were enemies,<WG2190> we were reconciled<WG2644> to God<WG2316> by the death<WG2288> of his Son,<WG5207> much<WG4183> more,<WG3123> being reconciled,<WG2644> we shall be saved<WG4982> by his life.<WG2222>

And not only<WG3440> so, but we also<WG2532> joy<WG2744> in God<WG2316> through<WG1223> our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> by whom<WG3739> we have now<WG3568> received<WG2983> the atonement.<WG2643>

Why,<WG1223> <WG5124> as by one<WG1520> man<WG444> sin<WG266> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the world,<WG2889> and death<WG2288> by sin;<WG266> and so<WG3779> death<WG2288> passed<WG1330> on all<WG3956> men,<WG444> for that all<WG3956> have sinned:<WG264>
(For until<WG891> the law<WG3551> sin<WG266> was in the world:<WG2889> but sin<WG266> is not imputed<WG1677> when there is no<WG3361> law.<WG3551>

Nevertheless<WG235> death<WG2288> reigned<WG936> from Adam<WG76> to Moses,<WG3475> even<WG2532> over<WG1909> them that had not sinned<WG264> after<WG1909> the similitude<WG3667> of Adam's<WG76> transgression,<WG3847> who<WG3739> is the figure<WG5179> of him that was to come.<WG3195>

But not as the offense,<WG3900> so<WG3779> also<WG2532> is the free<WG5486> gift.<WG5486> For if<WG1487> through the offense<WG3900> of one<WG1520> many<WG4183> be dead,<WG599> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> the grace<WG5485> of God,<WG2316> and the gift<WG1431> by grace,<WG5485> which<WG3588> is by one<WG1520> man, Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> has abounded<WG4052> to many.<WG4183>

And not as it was by one<WG1520> that sinned,<WG264> so is the gift:<WG1434> for the judgment<WG2917> was by one<WG1520> to condemnation,<WG2631> but the free<WG5486> gift<WG5486> is of many<WG4183> offenses<WG3900> to justification.<WG1345>

For if<WG1487> by one<WG1520> man's offense<WG3900> death<WG2288> reigned<WG936> by one;<WG1520> much<WG4183> more<WG3123> they which receive<WG2983> abundance<WG4050> of grace<WG5485> and of the gift<WG1431> of righteousness<WG1343> shall reign<WG936> in life<WG2222> by one,<WG1520> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>)

Therefore<WG686> <WG3767> as by the offense<WG3900> of one<WG1520> judgment came on all<WG3956> men<WG444> to condemnation;<WG2631> even<WG2532> so<WG3779> by the righteousness<WG1345> of one<WG1520> the free gift came on all<WG3956> men<WG444> to justification<WG1347> of life.<WG2222>

For as by one<WG1520> man's<WG444> disobedience<WG3876> many<WG4183> were made<WG2525> sinners,<WG268> so<WG3779> by the obedience<WG5218> of one<WG1520> shall many<WG4183> be made<WG2525> righteous.<WG1342>
Moreover<WG1161> the law<WG3551> entered,<WG3922> that the offense<WG3900> might abound.<WG4121> But where<WG3757> sin<WG266> abounded,<WG4121> grace<WG5485> did much<WG5248> more abound:<WG5248>

That as sin<WG266> has reigned<WG936> to death,<WG2288> even<WG2532> so<WG3779> might grace<WG5485> reign<WG936> through<WG1223> righteousness<WG1343> to eternal<WG166> life<WG2222> by Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> our Lord.<WG2962>
